questions.text: The federal government should eliminate national abortion laws, returning authority to individual states.
questions.trumpNote: States should decide. Roe v. Wade was wrongly decided.
questions.bidenNote: Supports federal protection of abortion rights.

questions.text: Immigration policies should be reformed to provide easier pathways for skilled workers and graduates of U.S. colleges.
questions.bidenNote: Support easier paths for skilled immigrants and graduates.

questions.text: The U.S. should prioritize diplomacy and avoid further NATO expansion to reduce tensions with Russia.
questions.trumpNote: NATO members should pay their fair share. Avoid provoking Russia.
questions.bidenNote: Strengthen NATO alliances. Stand firm against Russian aggression.

questions.text: The government should implement a universal healthcare system, replacing the current private insurance model.
questions.trumpNote: Free market healthcare. Repeal and replace Obamacare.
questions.bidenNote: Expand Affordable Care Act. Add public option.

questions.text: Climate change should be addressed through strict regulations on industries and significant investment in renewable energy.
questions.trumpNote: Regulations hurt business. Climate change concerns exaggerated.
questions.bidenNote: Rejoin Paris Agreement. Invest in clean energy.

questions.text: The Second Amendment right to bear arms should be protected, with minimal federal restrictions on gun ownership.
questions.trumpNote: Strongly support 2nd Amendment rights. Oppose new gun control.
questions.bidenNote: Support 2nd Amendment, but with 'common sense' gun laws.

questions.text: The federal minimum wage should be significantly increased to keep pace with the cost of living.
questions.trumpNote: Let states decide. Federal increase could hurt small businesses.
questions.bidenNote: Support gradual increase to $15/hour federal minimum wage.

questions.text: The government should increase funding for law enforcement and take a tougher stance on crime.
questions.trumpNote: Back the Blue. Tough on crime and illegal immigration.
questions.bidenNote: Reform, don't defund police. Address systemic racism.

questions.text: Corporate tax rates should be lowered to stimulate economic growth and job creation.
questions.trumpNote: Lower taxes create jobs and economic growth.
questions.bidenNote: Corporations should pay their fair share. Raise corporate tax rate.
